Articles.Content:
Hi,

I\'m happy to officially announce today the addition of two new members to our dev team.

Mario and Marco are both Squad veterans already, and have now been assigned to the KSP Team.

They\'re both coders, and will be helping me and Alex develop new features and fix bugs.

I\'ll let them introduce themselves here more properly.

Cheers

Hi, Marco here reporting for duty, I\'ll be developing KSP full time from now on. It\'s nice to be a part of this Dev-team and also part of the KSP community.

Cheers.

Hello!

Mario here, don\'t mind the username.

It is awesome to see how much the game and the community has grown since the beginning. We\'ll make sure to keep it growing for the better.

I\'ve been wanting to make games since I was a little child, I have done some small things by myself, nothing too big, and KSP is a great oportunity to take part in a big game project.

The other stuff we do in squad is cool too, don\'t get me wrong, and we\'ll keep making it, but It\'s great to be able to contribute as part of the KSP Team, and we\'ll make it count

Welcome guys!

It\'s nice to have you around here!

Welcome!

More developers is almost always a good thing!

[Can we assume that this means we\'ll get new content nearly twice as fast? ]
Hello new team members!

Hello there, and Welcome!

2 more dedicated Developers should make v0.14.0 even that much better! Looking so forward to it now.

Yaay team! :w00t:

What? (Who says I\'m not supposed to handle the cheerleaders? > I don\'t believe you! What ELSE are they good for?)
I see devs/mods/important people are blue now.

I see devs/mods/important people are blue now.

Some are red.
Admins are red, Global Mods are blue, normal Mods are green.

Great work on the game so far! Other than Dwarf Fortress, nothing stress tests my CPU like KSP! Mind you, I am obsessed with launching a normal rocket into orbit or landing it on the Mun. I mean, those Kerbals are going to need a spare up there!

Welcome! I\'ve always wanted to program too! (ok so making an MMO in gamemaker probably wasn\'t the best start, but I find C++ a bit hard to chew.) Looking forward to some great new humour in the forums (if Harv doesn\'t keep you too busy with everything else)

Ah, awesome, I hope this helps Squad\'s workload (workaholics!)

Hello, hello!
Man do i love the Dev involvement in these forums. Love ya guys, have fun at work =P
Welcome, hope you guys keep churning out awesome features
Great to hear things are growing!
Welcome! I hope you guys have fun working on the game.

Welcome!

May ksp be stronger then ever when are new team members!

That rhymed just for you!

\'Team Kerbal\'

Oh, that is so boss. 8)
Good show that Squad! Nice to see more people to the awesome!
Welcome! The more the merrier and the better KSP will become!

Welcome there new developers!

You will soon learn that this is all a work from one man. The man called 'jesus'.

Bless you!

How\'d Victor get 500+ posts?

I smell magic!

Also, I pre-ordered.

How\'d Victor get 500+ posts?

I smell magic!

Also, I pre-ordered.

Been a member since July 12, 2011, isn\'t that hard to write some tripe.
